name: Synapse
description: Synapse Bridge allows users to seamlessly swap on-chain assets across 15+ EVM and non-EVM blockchains in a safe and secure manner. Most of these routes use AMM based liquidity with some using RFQ based filling.
auction_design_details: The first accepted filler bid automatically wins the auction irrespective of whether another bid comes in at roughly the same time with a better price or outcome for the user
auction_openness_details: Auctions occur entirely on chain with no auction period of shielded competition window and there are no preferential Filler selection mechanisms.
filler_permissionlessness_details: Synapse does not provide documentation or reference code for running a Filler. Contract code suggests addresses claiming and filling orders have to be whitelisted by the protocol.
censorship_resistance_details: Only a protocol run filler can fill orders due to restrictions imposed within the contract to whitelist fillers.
filler_failure_resistance_details: If an order remains unfulfilled for a short period, there is a short dispute window which theoretically allows an order to be refunded after a 7 day delay period. Only addresses with a special desputer permission can initiate this process.
